# SCPousseur

This project aims to implement the Harmonics Networks developed by Henri Pousseur as described in his paper "L'Apothéose de Rameau - Essai sur la Question Harmonique". In: Musiques Nouvelles XXI, fasc. 2-4 de la Revue d'Esthétique, Paris: Éditions Klincksieck, 1968. p.105-72, for SuperCollider and PureData.

# Developed by:

* Flávio Luiz Schiavoni
* Rael B. Gimenes Toffolo

Project site:
[Pousseur at Sourceforge](https://sourceforge.net/projects/scpousseur/)
